missing_permissions.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è
missing_permissions.description:
Discord Tickets requires the following permissions:
%s

invalid_named_args.description:
There is an error in your command syntax: `%s`.
Type `%s` for an example.
Please ask a member of staff if you are unsure.
invalid_named_args.title: ‚ùå Invalid syntax

member_or_role.description: A member mention, a role mention, or the ID of a member or role
member_or_role.name: memberOrRole

blacklist.description: Blacklist/unblacklist a member from interacting with the bot
blacklist.name: blacklist

empty_list.description: There are no members or roles blacklisted. Type `%sblacklist <memberOrRole>` to add a member or role to the blacklist.
empty_list.title: üìÉ Blacklisted members and roles

illegal_action.description: %s is a staff member and cannot be blacklisted.
illegal_action.title: ‚ùå You can't blacklist this member

member_added.description: <@%s> has been added to the blacklist. They will no longer be able to interact with the bot.
member_added.title: ‚úÖ Added member to blacklist

member_removed.description: <@%s> has been removed from the blacklist. They can now use the bot again.
member_removed.title: ‚úÖ Removed member from blacklist

role_added.description: <@&%s> has been added to the blacklist. Members with this role will no longer be able to interact with the bot.
role_added.title: ‚úÖ Added role to blacklist

role_removed.description: <@&%s> has been removed from the blacklist. Members with this role can now use the bot again.
role_removed.title: ‚úÖ Removed role from blacklist

ticket.description: The number or a channel mention of the ticket to close
ticket.name: ticket

closed.description:
This ticket has been closed.
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed.title: ‚úÖ Ticket closed

closed_by_member.description:
This ticket has been closed by %s.
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed_by_member.title: ‚úÖ Ticket closed

closed_by_member_with_reason.description:
This ticket has been closed by %s: `%s`
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed_by_member_with_reason.title: ‚úÖ Ticket closed

closed_with_reason.description:
This ticket has been closed: `%s`
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed_with_reason.title: ‚úÖ Ticket closed

has_a_ticket.description: Please use your existing ticket (<#%s>) or close it before creating another.
has_a_ticket.title: ‚ùå You already have an open ticket

max_tickets.description:
Please use `%sclose` to close any unneeded tickets.

%s
max_tickets.title: ‚ùå You already have %d open tickets

no_categories.description: A server administrator must create at least one ticket category before a new ticket can be opened.
no_categories.title: ‚ùå Can't create ticket

select_category.description:
Select the category most relevant to your ticket's topic:

%s
select_category.title: üî§ Please select the ticket category

select_category_timeout.description: You took too long to select the ticket category.
select_category_timeout.title: ‚ùå Reaction time expired

request_topic.description: Please briefly state what this ticket is about in a a few words.
request_topic.title: Ticket topic

description.description: The description for the panel message
description.example: "React to this message to open a ticket."
description.name: description

title.description: The title for the panel message
title.name: title

invalid_category.description: One or more of the specified category IDs is invalid.
invalid_category.title: ‚ùå Invalid category

mismatch.description: Please provide the name number of emojis and category IDs.
mismatch.title: ‚ùå Invalid input

command_execution_error.description:
An unexpected error occurred during command execution.
Please ask an administrator to check the console output / logs for details.
command_execution_error.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è

message_will_be_deleted_in: This message will be deleted in %d seconds

missing_permissions.description:
You do not have the permissions required to use this command:
%s
missing_permissions.title: ‚ùå

staff_only.description: You must be a member of staff to use this command.
